snippet.title: 5 Ways To Make Monday Your Best Marketing Day

main.title: 5 Ways To Make Monday Your Best Marketing Day
main.subtitle:
Tuesday, October 11th

1 pm ET / 10 am PST / 6 pm GMT / 8 pm EEST

speakers.profession-2:
Social and Community Manager
at Semrush

synopsis.title: Synopsis
synopsis.text-1: Turn your Marketing Monday into the best day of the week. No more aimless jumping from task to task leaving you wondering where the day went; this “day-in-the-life” webinar will transform your Mondays into the day that catapults you through your most productive week ever!  Because when your week starts off right, you’re ready to take on anything!
synopsis.subtitle: We’ll talk about:
synopsis.li-1: Quick wins for a feeling of accomplishment early in the week
synopsis.li-1_4: Boost Momentum & Speed of Making Site Improvements
synopsis.li-2: A workflow that works for you
synopsis.li-3: How to get it all done with the tools you’re already using
synopsis.text-4: Alisa and Diana, both Semrush veterans, are ready to help you tackle your week head on. Register today to join the conversation live.

success.title: Thank you for your registration!
success.text: We’ll send you an email with the details on the next steps shortly.
